title: Algebra
quote: Dive into equations and unravel the secrets of variables!

questions.question: What is the solution to the equation 2x + 5 = 15?
What is the sum of the roots of the quadratic equation ax² + bx + c = 0?
If x² - 4x + 4 = 0, what is the value of x?
What is the factorization of x² - 9?
What is the value of x in the equation 3x - 7 = 2?
